name: Corpo Mayhem
description:
Game created on the first game jam in Szczecin in 2017. The theme of Gryf Game Jam 2017 was ,,Gadgets”. The team created a co-op top-down action game in which you take on the role of a office worker in a Corp Mayhem Battle Royale. Player must fight using deadly gadgets that are available in the office. When there are lifted this gadgets takes a part of our HP.

Controls:
Player 1
Up - W
Down - S
Right - D
Left - A
Action - Q

Player 2
Up - Y
Down - H
Right - J
Left - G
Action - T

Player 3
Up - P
Down - ;
Right - '
Left - L
Action - O

Player 4
Up - Up Arrow
Down - Down Arrow
Right - Right Arrow
Left - Left Arrow
Action - Right Ctrl

Restart - Esc
Exit - Alt + F4
